content:
I hope this is an acceptable place to ask, apologies if not

I'm giving some Rust training courses, both at a beginner and intermediate level. I was wondering if anyone knew of a good list of open and active issues people could contribute to on OSS projects at that kind of skill level
TWIR has a list of projects I think: https://this-week-in-rust.org/blog/2020/11/25/this-week-in-rust-366/#call-for-participation
and in general the dev-tools always need help and aren't too hard to hack on :)
Thanks, I'll definitely point out the TWIR options. Sorry if this is naive, but what do you mean by dev-tools? Are you referring to rustc/Cargo/rustup?
